name: Classic Aso-Oke Red Stripe
description: Handwoven red striped Aso-Oke, premium cotton blend. This classic design is perfect for creating stunning Agbada, Iro and Buba, or modern fusion outfits. The vibrant red is complemented by intricate gold threads, representing royalty and celebration.
short_description: Handwoven red striped Aso-Oke for classic looks.
alt: Close up of red and gold striped Aso-Oke fabric

name: Royal Blue 'Sanyan' Weave
description: A deep royal blue Aso-Oke in the traditional 'Sanyan' weaving style, known for its subtle beige stripes. This fabric is a statement of elegance and is favored for high-profile events. Made with a mix of cotton and silk threads for a luxurious feel.
alt: Royal blue Aso-Oke fabric with subtle beige stripes

name: Emerald Green 'Alaari' Aso-Oke
description: Rich emerald green Aso-Oke, a modern take on the 'Alaari' (deep red) style. This vibrant piece is perfect for those who want to stand out. It features a dense weave that is both durable and comfortable.
alt: A bolt of emerald green Aso-Oke fabric

name: Monochrome 'Etu' Design
description: A sophisticated monochrome Aso-Oke in the 'Etu' (guinea fowl) pattern, characterized by its dark indigo/black color with tiny light dots. A timeless choice for any formal occasion, symbolizing wisdom and maturity.
alt: Black and white patterned 'Etu' Aso-Oke fabric

name: Sunshine Gold Metallic Weave
description: A dazzling Aso-Oke woven with metallic gold threads that catch the light beautifully. This fabric is designed for grand entrances and is the ultimate choice for brides, grooms, and celebrants.
short_description: Dazzling metallic gold Aso-Oke for celebrants.

name: Pastel Pink & Silver Blend
description: A contemporary Aso-Oke featuring a soft pastel pink interwoven with shimmering silver threads. Perfect for modern traditional weddings, baby dedications, and chic events. It offers a gentle and romantic aesthetic.
short_description: Modern pastel pink and silver Aso-Oke.
alt: Soft pastel pink Aso-Oke with silver threads
